mapper.sql: ESM.f_id as ESMid,ESM.f_name as ESMname,ESM.f_type as ESMtype,ESM.f_address as ESMaddress,ESM.t_address_block_f_id as ESMtAddressBlockFId,ESM.f_tel as ESMtel,ESM.f_link_name as ESMlinkName,ESM.f_email as ESMemail,ESM.f_fax as ESMfax,ESM.f_store_pic as ESMstorePic,ESM.f_pro_pic as ESMproPic,ESM.f_shop_photoes as ESMshopPhotoes,ESM.f_distance as ESMdistance,ESM.f_delive_time as ESMdeliveTime,ESM.f_start_time as ESMstartTime,ESM.f_end_time as ESMendTime,ESM.f_isFetch as ESMisfetch,ESM.f_user_name as ESMuserName,ESM.f_owner_phone as ESMownerPhone,ESM.f_owner_id_photoes as ESMownerIdPhotoes,ESM.f_auto_confirm_receive_period as ESMautoConfirmReceivePeriod,ESM.f_introduce as ESMintroduce,ESM.f_store_audit_status as ESMstoreAuditStatus,ESM.f_store_audit_desc as ESMstoreAuditDesc,date_format(ESM.f_store_audit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as ESMstoreAuditTime,ESM.f_store_auditor_id as ESMstoreAuditorId,ESM.f_owner_audit_status as ESMownerAuditStatus,ESM.f_owner_audit_desc as ESMownerAuditDesc,date_format(ESM.f_owner_audit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as ESMownerAuditTime,ESM.f_owner_auditor_id as ESMownerAuditorId,ESM.f_least_delivery_amt as ESMleastDeliveryAmt,ESM.f_max_delivery_amt as ESMmaxDeliveryAmt,ESM.f_revenue_type as ESMrevenueType,ESM.f_revenue_rate as ESMrevenueRate,ESM.f_order as ESMorder,ESM.f_express_type as ESMexpressType,ESM.f_withdraw_password as ESMwithdrawPassword

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_ebuy_supply_merchant ,f_name=#{name} ,f_type=#{type} ,f_address=#{address} ,t_address_block_f_id=#{tAddressBlockFId} ,f_tel=#{tel} ,f_link_name=#{linkName} ,f_email=#{email} ,f_fax=#{fax} ,f_store_pic=#{storePic} ,f_pro_pic=#{proPic} ,f_shop_photoes=#{shopPhotoes} ,f_distance=#{distance} ,f_delive_time=#{deliveTime} ,f_start_time=#{startTime} ,f_end_time=#{endTime} ,f_isFetch=#{isfetch} ,f_user_name=#{userName} ,f_owner_phone=#{ownerPhone} ,f_owner_id_photoes=#{ownerIdPhotoes} ,f_auto_confirm_receive_period=#{autoConfirmReceivePeriod} ,f_introduce=#{introduce} ,f_store_audit_status=#{storeAuditStatus} ,f_store_audit_desc=#{storeAuditDesc} ,f_store_audit_time=str_to_date(#{storeAuditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_store_auditor_id=#{storeAuditorId} ,f_owner_audit_status=#{ownerAuditStatus} ,f_owner_audit_desc=#{ownerAuditDesc} ,f_owner_audit_time=str_to_date(#{ownerAuditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_owner_auditor_id=#{ownerAuditorId} ,f_least_delivery_amt=#{leastDeliveryAmt} ,f_max_delivery_amt=#{maxDeliveryAmt} ,f_revenue_type=#{revenueType} ,f_revenue_rate=#{revenueRate} ,f_order=#{order} ,f_express_type=#{expressType} ,f_withdraw_password=#{withdrawPassword} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_ebuy_supply_merchant ,f_name=#{item.name} ,f_type=#{item.type} ,f_address=#{item.address} ,t_address_block_f_id=#{item.tAddressBlockFId} ,f_tel=#{item.tel} ,f_link_name=#{item.linkName} ,f_email=#{item.email} ,f_fax=#{item.fax} ,f_store_pic=#{item.storePic} ,f_pro_pic=#{item.proPic} ,f_shop_photoes=#{item.shopPhotoes} ,f_distance=#{item.distance} ,f_delive_time=#{item.deliveTime} ,f_start_time=#{item.startTime} ,f_end_time=#{item.endTime} ,f_isFetch=#{item.isfetch} ,f_user_name=#{item.userName} ,f_owner_phone=#{item.ownerPhone} ,f_owner_id_photoes=#{item.ownerIdPhotoes} ,f_auto_confirm_receive_period=#{item.autoConfirmReceivePeriod} ,f_introduce=#{item.introduce} ,f_store_audit_status=#{item.storeAuditStatus} ,f_store_audit_desc=#{item.storeAuditDesc} ,f_store_audit_time=str_to_date(#{item.storeAuditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_store_auditor_id=#{item.storeAuditorId} ,f_owner_audit_status=#{item.ownerAuditStatus} ,f_owner_audit_desc=#{item.ownerAuditDesc} ,f_owner_audit_time=str_to_date(#{item.ownerAuditTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_owner_auditor_id=#{item.ownerAuditorId} ,f_least_delivery_amt=#{item.leastDeliveryAmt} ,f_max_delivery_amt=#{item.maxDeliveryAmt} ,f_revenue_type=#{item.revenueType} ,f_revenue_rate=#{item.revenueRate} ,f_order=#{item.order} ,f_express_type=#{item.expressType} ,f_withdraw_password=#{item.withdrawPassword} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_ebuy_supply_merchant WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
